group_id.description: The unique identifier of the group to which the label belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the group label.

name.description: The name of the group label.

color.description: The color associated with the group label for visual identification.

description.description: The short description of the group label.

description_html.description: The HTML formatted description of the group label.

text_color.description: The text color used for the group label.

subscribed.description: Indicates if the user is subscribed to notifications for this group label.

open_issues_count.description: The total number of open issues in the group label.

closed_issues_count.description: The total number of closed issues in the group label.

open_merge_requests_count.description: The total number of open merge requests in the group label.
